Blog.post: waah...today quite sian arz...well,end of it...nowadaes very lazy to erite blog le...tt's all...
today was an okay day for me la...nothing to say le...bye!!!:)anyway,i'll quite happy,cuz i sort of contacted my frd whom i mizz...lol...kkz...so happy!!!:))bubbyes!!!!!
today very gd arz...mrs khor didn't come sch!!!!!!!way cool man!!!!!!!lol...

today finally back in sch le...erm...juz as usual!!!lol...but wan ting and i haf a lot of interesting stuff to tell each other!!!example go malacca,etc...haha...so erm...finally manx!!!mrs khor changed our seats!!!now instead or the JOENAs city,we broke up into the HANs airlines!!!way cool manx...i'm the pilot of my airplane!!!pei zhen and nisha are my wings!!!airplane wings la...muahahaha!!!only 3 pplz in a row!!!unique sia!!!so happy manx!!!my new seats much much better!!!can do lortsa stuff which teachers can't see!!!thinking of more pranks up my sleeves!!!well,we the HANs airlines.muz think of more interesting and wacky stuff to do,or else we will be very bored!!!:)frm my position,can see wan ting better somemore!!!hehe...can tok more and much easier!!!can't wait for tlm,wonder wat other interesting or stupid stuff we'll do...haha!!!well,tt's all 4 today...
oh no!!!i'm down with flu again!!!y izzit always me!!!haiz...hope tmr it will not be as bad as today,or i'll suffer and use lorts of packet tissue paper!!!lol...good luck to me!!!!!:)

yay!!!finally created my blog AGAIN!!!lost my previous blog's password...so too bad la,need to create another one...hmmm...yesterday's national day parade not too bad la!as for the singapore idol,felt a little sorry for the shanghai guy.poor thing lehz,got eliminated!!!anyway...today theresa told me a great big joke online manx...lol...can't believe tt that stupid freak didn't noe tt the person does not even noe her at all,and yet she assumes that that person noes her...lol...still everytym imagining tt person looking at her!!!lol...haha...thinking of it makes me laugh manx!!!:)making a fool out of herself and yet she still doesn't noe...well,we intend not to tell anybody about this,later they leak the secret out,and it wun be fun anymore!!!let her find out herself.[well for we noe she wun]this sounds a bit mean larx...but too bad it has nothing got to do with us:)she herself created this big joke!!!haha...kkz...dun wanna tok about this anymore...erm...yahoo!!!tlm going back to school le!!!wun feel sooooo bored staying at home,nothing to do!!!can go back see frds:)more jokes and pranks up my sleeves!!!so beware!!!lol...haiz...but tmr go back sch,need to listen to all the boring lessons and stuff!!!hope i wun fall asleep manx.haha.boy!!!there's going to be a maths test tmr on our new chapter...hope it's easy!!!:)erm...i guess i'll end here le ba...buaix... amanda~
